sponsor: Pfizer's Upjohn has merged with Mylan to form Viatris Inc.
officialTitle: A Three Year, Prospective, Open-label, Study To Evaluate Clinical Efficacy, Safety And Tolerability Of Atorvastatin In Children And Adolescents With Heterozygous Familial Hypercholesterolemia
summary: The purpose of this study is to characterize three year descriptive growth and development (ie, height, weight, body mass index, Tanner Stage) and efficacy of cholesterol reduction in pediatric subjects with Heterozygous Familial Hypercholesterolemia receiving atorvastatin treatment.

primaryOutcome.measure: Low Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol (LDL-C; Millimoles Per Liter [mMol/L]) During the Study
